title: Stainless Steel and Superb Service: Check out Alderwood's One Bedroom
posting_body: ['Do you enjoy the outdoors immersed in a city landscape?', 'Alderwood Apartment Homes offer brilliantly sized attractive apartment Homes in an idyllic setting!', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x766', 'From $3,697', '.', '2 Bed 2 Bath .', '1000 Sq.Ft', '* Unit 1313 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 0724 - Available 09/01/22', '* Unit 0715 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 1412 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 0816 - Available', 'Now', 'Alderwood Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '900 Pepper Tree Lane Santa Clara, CA 95051', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Join us for a self-guided or virtual tour!', 'Explore your new home from the comfort of your couch, or on a self-guided journey through our Neighborhood.', 'If you’re looking for quiet, easy living away from the hustle and bustle of Santa Clara, Alderwood Apartments is the community for you.', 'Surrounded by quiet and calming nature, but close enough to city convenience, Alderwood is the best of both worlds.', 'Our apartment homes feature 25-foot cathedral ceilings, dual-pane windows, and spacious walk-in closets to accommodate all your boxes and bags.', 'Soak in the sun from your private balcony while embracing the quiet and tranquility of garden living.', '24/7 package pickup ensures your deliveries arrive safe and secure, ready to be picked up whenever you have a moment to spare.', 'Finish the day with a dip in our pool, or a relaxing soak in the hot tub.', '(Pricing and availability subject to change, plus additional costs for utilities and third-party maintenance services.)', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT\u2002 \u2002FEATURES', 'Air Conditioning', 'Stainless steel appliances on Select Homes', 'Water/Fountain view on Select Homes', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', '1 Month- 13 Months', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', '9:00am to 5:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x766', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'DISCLAIMER:', 'Call for details: pricing/availability subject to change at any time.']
